name: Koi's Revenge
description:
Koi’s Revenge is a short experience but full of action.

  • INTRODUCTION

Shinji, a young policeman from the city of Tokyo, looking for his friend and colleague who has been missing for about a month.
One day Shinji receives a call that will change his life. What will happen?

  • HERO

Shinji wears a typical japanese jacket with a Koi on the back. He uses a Beretta 92, a shotgun and a knife.

  • CONTROLS

W/A/S/D for move
E for interact
Mouse for shooting
Mouse Wheel change weapon
ESC for pause

This game saves data automatically at any checkpiont.
